name: Nine Lives
description:
Think beyond your current life and solve puzzles by coordinating with your past and future lives!

Encounter all manner of creatures and obstacles that'll have you developing new strategies

Features

  • Progress through 9 different areas each adding a new twist.
  • Solve over 80 puzzles ranging from the very casual to the very challenging.
  • Use up to 9 lives to help solve increasingly challenging puzzles.
  • Cute voxel art style with a different theme for each of the nine areas.
  • Face dangerous thorny plants, catch sneaky rats, drown yourself in rivers and encounter much more as you make your way back to the wold of the living.
